cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.instructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed chilled glass. Garnish with lime.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: Muddle sugar with bitters and splash of water. Add bourbon and ice, stir until chilled. Express orange twist over drink.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint with sugar and lime juice. Add rum and ice, top with soda water. Gently stir. Garnish with mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.instructions: Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry and lime juice with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.instructions: Blend rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with ice until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mojito
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint leaves and sugar with lime juice. Add ice and top with soda water. Stir gently. Garnish with mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Shirley Temple
cocktails.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add ginger ale and a splash of grenadine. Stir gently. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Mango Lassi
cocktails.instructions: Blend mango, yogurt, milk, sugar, and ice until smooth. Serve chilled.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and sugar with ice. Strain into glass filled with ice. Top with soda water. Garnish with lemon slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Virgin Piña Colada
cocktails.instructions: Blend pineapple juice, coconut cream, and ice until smooth. Pour into glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.instructions: Shake bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with cherry and orange slice.
